alert.note: Alert for Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 4:17AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Saline County through 445 AM CDT... At 417 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles west of New Cambria, or 6 miles north of Salina, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salina and New Cambria. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 93 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 244 and 266. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
